module System.Docbuilder.Hxt where

import qualified Text.XML.HXT.Arrow.XmlArrow as Hxt
import qualified Text.XML.HXT.DOM.TypeDefs as Hxt


myAddAttr
  :: Hxt.ArrowXml a =>
     String
     -> String
     -> a Hxt.XmlTree Hxt.XmlTree
myAddAttr = Hxt.addAttr
